body_html: @martinwicke I have an older compiled version of tf1.1 with GPU support (cuda 8 + cudnn 5.1) has been working quite reliably so far on a similar setup. (by reliable I mean overnight training). I've been hesitant to upgrade to 1.2 due to lack of GPU support.
